title: How to Make Water Irrigation System

subtasks: Flatten the land surface using three pallets
Organize major equipment: big water tank, two medium tanks, and two motors
Assemble electric water pumps (1500 watts and 580 watts)
Apply teflon tape to pipe threads
Connect pipelines using PVC pipes and fittings
Install valves and components for water flow regulation
Set up the irrigation system with pesticide and liquid fertilizer tanks
Integrate a water softener and electric heater for microvial incubation
Prepare electrical components and disconnection board
Address potential issues with the automatic pump and water freezing
